website_summaries.verdict: With more game storage than most travel cases as well as the low price point, the amCase is tough to beat.
pros: The build quality is solid, especially at the low price point of this case
The case is slim, but holds a surprising amount
Storage is provided for up to 14 extra games, as well as the handheld Switch with joysticks attached, and a mesh pocket for extra accessories
Tight elastic bands keep the switch securely in place
The zipper is smooth and reliable
cons: The wrist strap seems small and flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Great Case, One Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great case that fits a wealthy number of Switch cartridges and kept my system well organized and compact on a multi-week international trip. The one thing that would have earned a perfect score and 5-star rating: The inner case’s mesh net doesn’t secure accessories adequately. It would have helped greatly if the extended to the top edge of the shell (rather than only half-way) and/or could be secured with a zipper. Because of the current design, you must be absolutely sure which side of the case holds the Switch, and, open the appropriately to ensure that any accessories do not fall out of the case, which happens far too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Low-profile and protective case
customer_reviews.text: Nice, low-profile, travel case. It's a snug fit with my switch and usb-c cable and no extra game cartridges (though I don't think cartridges will effect the bulk very much. There isn't enough room in the mesh pocket for an iPhone brick wall plug, but there's plenty of room for my usb-c cable and a low thin wall charger. If you're looking for a low-profile and protective case to protect your Switch in your backpack, this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case but functionality could be improved
customer_reviews.text: This case felt very sturdy and like it would protect my Switch in the inevitable scenario where I accidentally drop it :) Unfortunately, putting the actual Switch into the case was too tight of a squeeze for me to feel comfortable using it; putting it in essentially required compressing the L/R keys on the back, and made it difficult to extract the device from the case. While this means no wiggle room and a more secure fit, it personally did not suit what I was looking for. It's possible that I received a lemon, which I ultimately returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Ou

customer_reviews.title: ... -Nintendo Switch fits no problem inside the case -I like the ribbon ties to prevent Switch console fall off ...
customer_reviews.text: -Case feels durable and has stronger tension -It comes with game card holder -You can put USB Type-C Cable and AC adapter inside the case -Nintendo Switch fits no problem inside the case -I like the ribbon ties to prevent Switch console fall off by accident -Zipper was smooth and consistent -Color is black All in all, I like this black color Switch case, it's cheaper & affordable, and I highly recommended this for Nintendo Switch. Cons: I wish it comes with Standing Case.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lim

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with it. It is a very basic case, simple in design, but that is what I was looking for. It has a little pocket above the flap that you can put a few accessories, possibly another USB cable or extra Joy Con controllers. Plenty of extra game storage as well, with small sleeves on the center flap. My only gripe, and its not that bad is I thought there was a strange smell to the outer shell of the case. It has dissipated, but it took a few days.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Case, DON'T TRUST THE WRIST STRAP
customer_reviews.text: I love the organization of this thing. Fits the Switch perfectly, has plenty of spaces for your games, fits my small power bank, and some room for other accessories (like the wrist straps). Downside is that the wrist strap frayed after about a month, and my Switch took a tumble down some stairs. The case protected it (not a scratch!) but the case was ruined (the zipper was bent, so no longer worked). I guess in all, it would be cheaper than dropping my Switch down some stairs, but the wrist strap really needs to be better built
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Tran

customer_reviews.title: bad size
customer_reviews.text: First, this case is not 1.5" slim. It is 2" thick. Much bigger than I wanted. On top of that, the case is too narrow for the switch. If you try to put the switch inside it will press hard on the L and R buttons and you have to forcibly push the switch to fit inside. Then getting it out is nearly impossible because the L and R buttons are being crushed by the case.
customer_reviews.author: Martha H.

customer_reviews.title: Tldr: Reeks of chemicals
customer_reviews.text: This thing stinks! And I mean it's awful.. like poisonous awful... co-worker and I both agree that it smells like some sort of pesticide.. Does not hold the AC adapter like stated in the review. aside from the stench and the other issue, the case itself is nowhere as strong/stiff as it looks. tbh I wish I had opted for the more expensive hard shell case that holds everything at once, but oh well. this one works for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: STARSHAK3R

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a last minute Christmas gift for a young relative. It was cheap so I wasn’t expecting anything fancy, but it was so flimsy I felt bad gifting it at all. The relative probably threw it away! The cardboard sleeve it came wrapped in didn’t even fit properly, and the material and zipper were probably worth less than that cardboard. There’s also no way it can fit everything shown in the pictures. I have the Switch Lite and tested it before wrapping this, and the switch and charger were bulging out of it. Im skeptical whether the full size console could fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Erricka Grace

customer_reviews.title: Smells strong of cigarette smoke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case about 3 weeks ago to protect my newly purchased switch. Unfortunately, the case that was delivered has the most pungent cigarette smelling odor to it that I've ever experienced. Half a bottle a febreeze and weeks later and I still haven't been able to remove the smell. 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Tedster

customer_reviews.title: Good at protecting, difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the case. Really hard to get the switch out. The elastic bands that’s hold it in place get caught on the controllers and you have to scratch them pretty far to get it out. The switch fits very snug in the case so it is difficult to get it out of the case before the difficulties of getting it out of the elastic straps. The pocket in the case is pretty open and things will fall out. If the case is zipped they’ll stay within. But be careful if the case is unzipped.
customer_reviews.author: nm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Perfect carrying case, has a bunch of slots for physical games, and a separate section for accessories (ie headphones, spare joycons, the hand straps etc. I have an 8bitdo pro controller in there with its firmware update so that it works on the switch. Cheaper than buying the pro switch controller and it fits in this case as a bonus!) My only issue with it is the elastic bands that hold the switch are hard to slide on and slide off, I end up just laying the switch right on top of them instead of strapping it in. Not enough to deserve a negative star. Great case.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The case is very useful when you're constantly on the go
customer_reviews.text: The case is very useful when you're constantly on the go. The switch fits right in where its suppose to go. The straps to keep it secure are kind of annoying to put on with the joy-con joy stick getting in the way. In the image it says it can fit the power cord, but it doesn't unless you force it. The actual power cord/charger is thicker than the one showed in the advertisement. You'd probably have to get a smaller 3rd party charger to have it fit. Overall it's a good case to help prevent scratches to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Tangco

customer_reviews.title: Nice case with awful smell.
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits snug and securely in this case. The amount of games in this case is amazing and seems very durable. There is one HUGE problem with this case . . . it stinks. Like it literally has an awful smell as if it was in your chain smoking grandma's house for a month and someone did a once over with some febreeze. I'm going to air it out for a day or two and see where we are at. If the smell isn't any better then I'm going to have to return it. It's that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Abram

customer_reviews.title: Right size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Nice quality hard case design. - Fits my Switch even when I have a cover on the Switch. Cons: - None. I got what I paid for. Other: - Wish it was a bit deeper to fit the official Switch AC charger in the pocket without being a tight fit. - There is no zipper on the inside pocket, and sometimes a Joycon strap comes out inside the case. - I got this case because it is unmarked and has not over the top designs. I wanted something that didn't grab attention, and this work great for it. Overall score: 4/5, above average.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to rate this product in three ways, and they're all coincide with one another. I will start off with that this is a well-developed product. The case is great, it's all black, so it isn't easily noticable, which was why I picked this one out of many others. The case also fits the Switch snug. There was an issue with the mesh pouch, it didn't hold extra controllers, etc properly. If you're carrying multiple things, and if you end up flipping it on the wrong side, you will potentially drop the items. TechMatte's staff was great in helping me deal with the issue that I was having, and for that, they get a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Huajie

customer_reviews.title: fits nicely and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. For those complaining that it's hard to remove the switch from the case after wrapping with elastics-simply wrap the console at the corners with the elastic. One on the top right corner and the other on the bottom left (both diagonally), if you want to easily remove the SWITCH simply pull on the elastic and the console will lift easy. this holds all the games, and even the L+R tops for the Joycons while keeping a slim/portable appearance. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bloodpool11

customer_reviews.title: Small form factor case for ease in carrying around your switch
customer_reviews.text: Pretty standard case for a Nintendo Switch. Carried this around for around six months, protected my switch from multiple drops from varying heights with no damage. My only complaint with this case is the two elastic straps on the inside are in a position to get snagged on the joycon joysticks making it extremely hard to remove the switch from the case. I've generally resorted to just not putting them over the switch when I put them in the case. Positive: Durable Light Easy to carry Negative: Elastic straps are a pain to get off sometimes and snag on the joysticks
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with the price - every Switch owner needs one of these
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to make a decision on what case to get as Amazon has so many listings to choose from. I chose this particular case because it was overall among the most popular and highest rated. Additionally, I like the basic design and the sturdiness of the case. My Switch fits in the case nice and snug (not too tight and not loose at all); there is also plenty of space for extra games in the included slots and room for an extra set of controllers. I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Ace

customer_reviews.title: Nice and snug..just like we wanted
customer_reviews.text: We picked this case as my son wanted to bring it to school and his backpack is only so big and it fit in there easily..without too much bulk. He also didn't want to spend the time separating the controllers as they only had so much time during lunch to play it. If you are looking for a case to fit everything in..all the games, charger--ect...it might be a little tight but to just throw in the switch, controller and a couple games for a slim version...this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Steph120765

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel protection
customer_reviews.text: The first thing my teens wanted to do with their Nintendo Switch was to... take it places to play with friends. This case arrived quickly, was reasonably priced, and made my teens extremely happy. The expensive Switch is now protected and easy to transport. The case created a lot of holiday happiness, especially considering it is an inexpensive item that wasn't electronic in itself.
customer_reviews.author: MusicMommy

customer_reviews.title: Little too snug for my tastes
customer_reviews.text: The switch fits great in this case. I dont know what is normal, but I also wanted to put a USB cable in here with a wall adapter. With the switch, the usb cable and the wall adapter in there, I dont like the amount of pressure it seems to be putting on the analog sticks on the joycons. I may be just babying my new toy a bit, but I will most likely be looking into other case solutions in the future. This product does seem to offer great protection and if you are only looking to put other small things in there than I highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Erusiel

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a decent case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this simply because it was a "Today's Deals" offer (half-price), and we needed a proper case for my kid's Switch. This seems to be fine. The mesh pocket fits the AmazonBasics charging cord (it's not too bulky), and the elastic straps hold the Switch in place pretty well. We haven't "road tested" this yet but it seems pretty secure. I told my kid not to use the wrist strap, though; it attached very easily and I worry that it would detach easily as well.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer in MA

customer_reviews.title: Great case, bad smell
customer_reviews.text: First, I do like this case a lot. It serves its purpose well and seems secure and holds what it says it will for a very reasonable price. The one star deduction though is due to an awful smell that is still not gone after trying to leave it opened up to air out for several days (seller I purchased from was TechMatte). I do feel the smell is starting to diminish so I am keeping the case, but wanted to warn others that may be even more sensitive to smell than I am.
customer_reviews.author: KateKnew

customer_reviews.title: UGH. The smell...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because it looked like the best style for the price and it came with a discount for a screen protector. Big mistake! Stay away! I read the reviews about the smell and thought maybe I wouldn't get one that smelled. Nope. I put my brand new switch in it and after 2 minutes in the case the switch now smells like the case... It smells how others as described. Like a terrible cigarette odor. Stay away! In the small time I had the case it seemed very hard to remove the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Leondraconum

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hard case for transporting my switch. This case has more game slots than the others I had been looking at. The switch fits very snug unde two elastic straps. It’s a bit of a trick getting it out, what I do is pull one back behind the outside of the case and slide it out that side while holding the other elastic up. Haven’t had any problems other than that, and that’s pretty minor. Zipper is good, case is hard cover and protects it, and the pockets for the game cards are the perfect size. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cookie_monster

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and feel but puts pressure on joycons
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this case! I love the size for how much it can actually hold. Great for short trips, I wouldn’t use on long trips or pack with a lot of items as pressure on the case puts pressure on the joy con joysticks which may accelerate joy con drift. I really like this case tho the size and weight. It’s my second favorite case.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Delnorte

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: The Switch fits snugly on the case, which is good. It has these elastic bands that holds the switch in place as well for extra protection. I liked them, but one of them broke two days ago (about a week after I received it). This didn't upset me though, as I think I like it more without those elastic bands - ended up cutting the other one off. The games also fit snug and I think you have room for about 14 games! overall great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SilentBob890

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: This case feels nice. It’s mostly made of fabric, but fit retains its shell-like shape. It has slots for plenty of games and a pocket for cables that are very convenient. The only weakness of this case is where th console itself goes. There are elastic bands that hold the console within the case, but make it an arduous task to take out the switch. I just ignore them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Adame

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Efficient
customer_reviews.text: If you don't need all the unnecessary bells and whistles, crazy designs or a case made out of adamantium, then this is the one for you. It's black, nice material, double zippers which is really nice. The Switch slides into the straps easily and doesn't move around. It holds a surprisingly large amount of game cartridges--14--in little pouch-style slots on the opposite side from where you put the Switch, along with another larger pouch for accessories. I've bought from TechMatte before for my Switch's screen protector and they're top notch with customer service and quality. For simple, efficient, no-frills products, you couldn't choose better.
customer_reviews.author: Ian A.

customer_reviews.title: Good but small.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the case was great for someone who likes to carry the bare minimum. An issue I did have was that rather than having some cushion on the inner edgers of the case it was just small enough so their was no excess space. I didn’t like this because it forced my bumper buttons to stay pressed. Another issue was that there was pretty much only space for the switch itself. I couldn’t fit the standard charger in the case so you’d either have to have your switch charged or just get a more compact charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Great case even compared to high priced ones
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing. I love how simple it is, I know a lot of people like to play with friends on the switch but mine mostly get personal use so I don't need to be able to carry extra controllers or anything like that. This holds a lot of games and doesn't have any crazy contraption to do so. If you want a low cost, sturdy and simple case, this is the one for you
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Schobelock

customer_reviews.title: Plain, light protective case for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Super simple case. I picked it for it's plain design because it's not something that looks valuable, but it looks good. Since it won't hold the dock, it's meant to be an everyday, on-the-go case rather than a full blown travel case. The case will stand up to light wear such as protecting the system and games from getting scratched or messed up in your book bag. It's not heavy duty protection, but unless your handing it over to a child- do you really need it to be? It's good for regular usage and organization.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: A generic review
customer_reviews.text: The case does what it needs to do: protect my Switch without occupying too much storage space. The game holder is very convenient. I will say the coloring is lost almost quickly, but that's just a note (not worried about that, unless the coloring was a cheap option that can cause health problems, but I don't think that's the case... Pun not intended).
customer_reviews.author: Marlon A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice case.
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of mini slots for holding the game. I feel that it's the only aspect I wish it had an extra net pocket like the other side. Personally 90 percent of my games are bought through the ENintendo shop so all the slots in the carrying case feel useless. Otherwise I like the hard shell casing it has. However if you have younger kids carrying the switch in here it's not sturdy enough to help be drop resistant. Be careful. It's a good enough case for an adult to handle or travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily with my Switch. Holds games and console, plus it has a small mesh pocket for various items. I don't think it'd trust joycons in that pocket if there's already a set on the console, simply because this case doesn't have much flex. I'd be afraid of damaging the games in the sleeves, or possibly the controllers or screen. I find it's a nice place to put a spare USB type c cord.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great switch case for the price. Those with sensitive noses beware.
customer_reviews.text: A great case for the switch. Lightweight, seems durable enough although when I read hard case I thought it would be a bit harder but I dont plan on dropping it off of buildings but it should be fine. Only drawback is the horrible stench of the product itself. Just horrid. Had to spray body spray on it. If they could fix that, would definitely be a 5 star product
customer_reviews.author: tiera

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this case. My only complaint is that the switch is difficult to remove from the case when it's behind the elastic straps because it's too snug of a fit. But other than that, this case is perfect. Plenty of spots for game cartridges, space in the top for shoulder pads or whatever in the pocket.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We have an AM Case for my sons chromebook and love it, so it was an easy choice when I came across this case for his Christmas gift. He loves the case, It holds all of his games and fits the switch with the JOYcons on perfectly. There is room in the case for extra stuff as well. It feel sturdy and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Case seems a little small
customer_reviews.text: Not a terrible case but my first impressions are not very good. It's a little too cramped for the switch and when it's in the case the L and R buttons are pushed down and I am concerned that that might break the buttons overtime. The microfiber cloth for the screen is also too big and bends the sticks on the joy-cons which I am also worried it would mess them up after heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: scubagr

customer_reviews.title: Good build
customer_reviews.text: This carrying case is pretty great. I am able to fit (a bit tightly) my switch along with its dockable case. There are 14 slots for games, which for me is enough. You can fit a few cables and other things on the other side of the case. The material outside seems like it would be durable and would really protect the switch, if it were to be dropped. it comes with a small wrist lanyard thing and has 2 Pull Tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Chau

customer_reviews.title: ... week since I've had this carrying case and really happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Its been almost a week since I've had this carrying case and really happy with the purchase. The price is good and does it's job in protecting my switch. Nothing fancy to draw attention solid black color. Inside it has two spandex type straps to pin it down and keeping it from bouncing around when traveling although it can take an extra few seconds to pull it out from the straps I rather have that and know its secure when unzipping the case and have It fall out. Also acts as a game storage/accessory. Recommended highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy case with lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.text: The case is perfect for keeping your switch safe if that's what you're looking for. The game cartridge holder is also great. And the mesh pocket in the back can hold extra controllers and grips if needed. My only complaint really is that the straps that keep the switch held down is really hard to take off when you need to take your switch out. Otherwise great product worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: William Ly

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My son's been carrying his switch in a shopping bag smh so this was perfect! I had no idea you guys were based out of Pittsburgh until I got an email from you, which to me means a whole lot! That's so close to my hometown I will definitely be ordering more from you!
customer_reviews.author: Franki

customer_reviews.title: Case keeps system safe, but tough to remove
customer_reviews.text: The case feels sturdy, and the space in the top half of the clamshell is perfect for holding games and accessories. The bottom half of the clamshell is the exact size of the Switch with controllers attached - two elastic band's hold the system in place, which is the only downside I've got for this case. Removing the system is tricky because 1) the rigidity of the case prevents pushing it out, 2) the lip is a snug fit around the Switch which keep my fingers from prying it out, 3) and the elastics keep it secure, and snag on the joysticks.
customer_reviews.author: DayOfSoul

customer_reviews.title: Protect your investment and know where all your games are
customer_reviews.text: I got these to make sure that all my game cartridges were in one place and that the Switch was protected. The only thing I'd like to see improved is that you can not easily see what the games are when they are tucked into the elastic straps.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cost effective
customer_reviews.text: Affordability was key here. The case is a little tight (shoulder buttons are lightly depressed while in-case), and doesn't provide any solution for storing the device without the joycons attached to the body, but it holds the device, is sturdy, holds games and just generally gets the job done. It was also quite smelly when it arrived, like smoke and plastic, so I had to air it out for a few days, but now it's no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brick

customer_reviews.title: A Bad Smelly Smell
customer_reviews.text: sufficient size and storage for the Switch, games, and a few small cables. Downside is the smell. Tried airing it out, putting on it, and even a block of baking soda. It still, to this day, had a slight reek of cigarette smoke, or something you'd attribute to a factory in china.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A

customer_reviews.title: Item As Described - but no carry strap included
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Showed up on time. Everything we need fits in the case. The case is very durable. There are no inside zippers, but everything fits nicely. Cons: Did not come with the pictured strap (very disappointed). Hard to define top from bottom, so things can fall out if you aren't careful (easy fix with a sticker). Overall: would recommend if you are looking for a simple, cheap, carry case for your switch.
customer_reviews.author: Nye

customer_reviews.title: Just inCase
customer_reviews.text: This case is just what I was looking for, I personally like the hard case as it offers more protection than the soft case, in the instance of impact. It has plenty of little pockets for additional games, as well as extra space for additional accessories. The felt interior reduces scratches that could be caused by other materials.
customer_reviews.author: Echo Congdon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and secure case, but not bulky!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this case for a few months. I love it and it's been very useful in storing my Nintendo Switch and games in one sturdy place. The elastic bands keep the Switch securely in the case, which I appreciate. I only have one real constructive comment: While the case includes an additional netted pocket for accessories, the pocket isn't quite large enough for the Nintendo Switch charger or the large controller. It can be used for earbuds, and perhaps additional joycons! Overall, I just wish the pocket was a little bigger or a zipped pocket. Otherwise this case has been excellent! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Free of worries
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I would set my switch down that it would be knocked down and damaged. Now that I have this case I don’t worry! The straps to hold in the switch are perfect and I love that it’s a harder case. I have all of my games now carried in it. It makes it convenient while playing on the go because everything is in one spot.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2Boys

customer_reviews.title: I really like the case
customer_reviews.text: I really like the case. Lots of space for games, protective shell, some small extra storage. The only thing I do not like is the way the switch goes in it. You have to put it behind two straps that can be kind of annoying to maneuver around. Not a huge deal, but can be an annoying process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Or maybe a pull up strip of cloth like they have in some electronics to make the batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: A finger hole of some sort to lift the game system out. Or maybe a pull up strip of cloth like they have in some electronics to make the batteries easier to remove. Other than that, pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Enigma20XX

customer_reviews.title: Wished the pocket had a flap but its perfect otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy case to travel with. Perfect in every way, except it needs a flap to contain the stuff in the pocket (zippers could scratch). Specifically bought this case for its game organizations, it goes over the joycons; I worried about the cloth rubbing the joycon connection junction and pocket objects rubbing the joycons. The whole barrier divider made me more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cook-West

customer_reviews.title: Material quality seems good and the appearance is practical and minimalist
customer_reviews.text: Material quality seems good and the appearance is practical and minimalist. the entire Switch, along with attached JoyCons fits comfortably inside, with room for not only games, but (for example) the JoyCon grips, earbuds, and/or a charging cable. felt layers keep everything protected and there are optional elastic bands for extra security of the Switch itself.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Simms

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit, but overall okay
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit when the switch (with controllers) is inside the case... taking it out takes some maneuvering, especially because of the elastic that catches on the joysticks. So far, it has protected my switch, so no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & price point
customer_reviews.text: Quality is solid. Card slots are convenient and the back of the flap that touches the screen is soft material. I chose this case over others on amazon because flap goes edge-to-edge, no need to worry about items in the mesh pocket damaging the Switch. My only minor complaint is the elastic bands - they hold the Switch in well (too well?), it can be a pain to get it out. I have small fingers and still I have to dig around for a couple of seconds. Could use a removal tab like some of the other cases on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Great case, good fitment
customer_reviews.text: Great case, good fitment, even fits with a rubber bumper case over the Switch. I wouldn't call it "hard" like some other hard plastic cases, but I trust it thrown into a backpack. The ring on the wrist strap will break as others have noted. Replace it with a steel keychain ring, problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Rebar Jones

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a sturdy little case, and it does protect the switch when carrying it around, but the zipper broke after only a couple of days. Worth paying a little more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: K.S. in WA

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This case is nothing special. It is not flashy and unless you knew what was in it you would not think it was worthy of a second look if you were walking past and see it in a car seat. So...it is perfect! It has a place for more games than I own at the moment and all the accessories fit n like a glove. It is a very well thought out design and is more about functionality than flash.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Case at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Only drawback is getting the console back out of the case. Since the case is practically conformed to the exact specifications, there isn't much wiggle room.
customer_reviews.author: FanFiAddictTop Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ideal with nice price
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic case that I feel protects really well. I used it to hold my switch while flying on a plane. It protects the switch well and I like the 14 slots for games. I even keep my microsd adapter in one of the game cartridge slots. It’s 10 bucks and cheaper than most of the cases available without sacrificing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ben O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carrying case for Switch
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to stick in your backpack but still holds a good amount of games to bring with you on trips. Case is sturdy and keeps game system protected when not in use. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am always skeptical when it comes to low prices when everyone else is charging a higher rate. This product does not disappoint! I recommend it. It feels great and perfect size to carry with you anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Campos

customer_reviews.title: Very good so far
customer_reviews.text: Received it today. So far it looks like a good case. It indeed has a weird smell, but just leave it open and the smell will go away. I read some people complaining about the stripe. It looks ok so far. Come on, you shouldn't trust in a stripe, no matter how strong it looks like. If you are looking for a good case to carry you Switch in your backpack, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Decent for now
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap case to carry my switch around and this case definitely does the job. I will warn you though, the switch fits really snug without any kind of casing. I feel as if its a little too snug, so i take the switch out of the case while home.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: It smells
customer_reviews.text: I returned one and got another and they both smelled like they were in an electrical fire. We are keep the 2nd one and trying to get the smell out because my son really likes the layout. I have no idea why it smells that way but if you have a sensitive smell, don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: It's identical and the perfect price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for getting a third party! Everything actually fits snug. Games fit fairly well, no problems at all. I carry a dock adaptor and it was able to fit in the netted compartment, which completes all my switch essentials in one bag. Thank you for this product and it's price pitch!
customer_reviews.author: Patten

customer_reviews.title: Does its job at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great, well priced case for your Nintendo Switch. Soft interior protects the system from scratches. Semi-hard case exterior would likely protect your Switch from damage at an arms level fall (I wouldn't try throwing against a wall to test the protection!). Case fits nicely into my carry-on bag for work trips. I stopped using the harness straps after a few times since the hassle of slipping the Switch in and out of them isn't worth it. Just take caution unzipping the case if you forgo the straps so the system doesn't drop out.
customer_reviews.author: James Forte

customer_reviews.title: Solid Accessory for Switch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for awhile now, but I'm a little late to the party reviewing it because I honestly don't take my Switch with me all that much. I brought it home when I visited my family over the 4th as my sister is a huge fan of Zelda and Mario Kart. The case is a perfect fit for the Switch: snug, but not too difficult to remove. It's also solid enough that I didn't mind putting it in my backpack with a bunch of other gear. I used the little mesh pouch (which is separated from the Switch by a rigid panel to protect its screen) to hold game carts and the grips.
customer_reviews.author: W. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Safe Place to Store the Switch
customer_reviews.text: This is a safe place to store the switch when on the go. I also like the slots for our games instead of the original cases taking up lots of space and cartridges getting put in the wrong cases. The case was as described and I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Golding-Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Easy protection with storage for games and cords
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this to go with his new Switch. It works perfectly, and he was super excited about the game and cord storage. It was also a great price, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Long Distance Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be able to bring my switch out of the house safely and I'm happy with it. I do wish it maybe had a better strap/handle but I just usually put it in my backpack or bag so it isn't really an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great case, much sturdier than I expected. The case is hard, much harder compared to other Switch cases that I've seen. I love all the extra slots for games. The only drawback is that it doesn't have a flap that protects the screen, specifically. I chose this case, as my other choice wouldn't ship for two months and the reviews for this seemed promising. I'm glad I chose it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Zeigler

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 10 yr old boy who loves his Nintendo Switch. This case has traveled everywhere with us and survived it all. Holds everything he needs in it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonProShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This case is nice. It has a lot of slots to hold games. It’s sturdy and soft inside to prevent scratches. It’s a fine choice with fast shipping and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bobflac

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the Nintendo Switch. holds a ton of games and the charger, great for on the go and protecting your expensive console. I wish that the dock would fit in the case also, but this is a great portable, space efficient case!
customer_reviews.author: carly smith

customer_reviews.title: Good case, tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this case for the switch we had bought for Christmas. The case is actually really nice quality. Would provide quite a bit of protection when traveling. Only issue is that the charging cord is a tight fit in the case, especially with other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great Price without sacrificing quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: This case is very durable and my switch fits perfectly even with silicone skins on my joycons. I've already dropped this case several times and there is no visible or internal damage to the console. The zippers not being flush with the case adds more protection than you would think. I would recommend this case to anyone who wants a durable, unmarked case for their Nintendo switch console. It even comes with a detachable wrist strap.
customer_reviews.author: Edmanuel Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Decent case!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this mostly because of the game chip holders. It seems like it will protect the switch pretty well. I also liked that it was affordable compared to other cases. The fabric was a bit frayed when I got it, but it’s probably from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever for the switch
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my games, the two elastic straps secure the switch, (to test it out I held it upside down for 5 minutes while shaking it), outer shell protects very well, I even dropped it a couple of times on accident, and I dont regret one day not buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely protects the switch
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of holding the switch and games. However, the charger (even the smaller car charger) and other bits and bobs just have no room. Also the zipper fell off the first time we used it, as it wasn’t stitched at the track ends. That said, it’s super safe and protective, as well as easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Emmie Ledsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great case for your switch
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy case designed for your switch. I can put it in my backpack without fear of being crushed. There's a mesh pocket for my USB-C cord, and there are enough slots inside to hold 14 game cartridges. It also comes with a wrist strap, but I took that off (left it on for the photo). All-in-all I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Spartan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This case holds the game cards in well and keeps the system well protected. It looks great and has held up well after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Briana S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used this to travel. Worked great. Packed it away in a checked bag on the way home and stayed well protected. Easy to place and remove games and the device.
customer_reviews.author: Jenerator

customer_reviews.title: Awful smell
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like to give a negative review, but this smelled awful, like cigarette smoke or burnt plastic, and was unusable. Go for the Wiwu or Switchbank brands instead, I got one of each of those and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Rosenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We needed a switch case fast and local stores carried ones that were pricey. This case was exactly what we were looking for. Just as described and pictured, this case protects and stores. Great price for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and effective
customer_reviews.text: Good case! Budget friendly and serves its purpose. Also very sturdy, which is important. My son loves that he can store his games on here as well. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Great case, incredibly sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Great Switch case that honestly has everything I could possibly need. Took it on the plane with me overseas and did not have to take it out of the case at security. Feels incredibly sturdy while keeping the size minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Case looks functional and nice, but dear god does it smell horrible. I can smell what I'd describe as rubber burning in an old firepit fro m 2-3 feet away. I'm currently afraid to put my switch in the case until this thing airs out. If the smell goes away, I'll update my review. If it doesn't, I'm going to have to return this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C

customer_reviews.title: Has a terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and probably works just fine, but I don't know because mine has an intense chemical smell that hasn't gone away yet (it's been a week since I received it), so I haven't used it.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Hart

customer_reviews.title: It was so bad that I had to febreeze it constantly for 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: The case functioned as advertised; however, as soon as I opened the package it reeked of cigarette smoke. It was so bad that I had to febreeze it constantly for 4 days while it sat on the porch as it would stink up the entire apartment. I was able to get the smell out eventually, but this thing smelled like anything that came out of my ex-wife's grandmother's house that she smoked in for 45 years straight.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Giannini

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson to carry around his Nintendo Switch. For the price it is a very good deal. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ann Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality case. Fits the Switch perfectly. It’s nice to have a safe place for the gaming system when traveling. It is a little difficult to remove the Switch from the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, bad smell
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy. It was strong and very simple to understand. My only issue with it was the smell. I tried rubbing some fabric sheets to it and leaving some as well on the inside. The smell on the inside a little better but the outside didn't really change at all. Still love the product, would not recommend if you're someone that gets headaches/migraines easily from smell.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R

customer_reviews.title: Great case for your Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and it's exactly what he needed. It fits well in his backpack and it's sturdy enough to protect his Switch and games. Happy customer here.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, very compact
customer_reviews.text: The case has room for plenty of games for the switch, and adequate room for other smaller accessories. It can easily fit a few more joy-cons but any full size controller would have difficulty fitting. For it's compact size you couldn't ask for much more, and it feels sturdy enough to take a basic fall. I would definitely recommend it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Griffen Himes

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything except for you can’t fit the controller connector which allows you to play like and other concil video game and also it smelled awful when I opened it and I felt like I was going to be sick. Oh and you can’t fit the charger either.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great case for your Nintendo Switch and a great price ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case for your Nintendo Switch and a great price to boot. This a great case for quick on the go travels, now nothing extreme like protection if it fell from a 2 story building but it's not meant for that. No real issues but there's no indicator to tell which side is up so when you open it you're not opening the wrong side but I just placed a sticker and a quick fix; no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Reyna

product_meta.title: amCase Carrying Case for Nintendo Switch-14 Game Cartridge Holders with Zipper Protective Shell Travel Case (Black)
feature_bullets: Protect your Nintendo Switch in our Unique Stylish Black Carrying Case!
Our simplistic design allows for easy transportation and storage, while also keeping the Switch Safe in a hard protective shell.
Your Switch slips easily into the carrying pouch, along with up to 14 game cartridges
Our interior mesh pocket allows for additional storage for smaller Switch accessories such as extra Joy-Cons, power bank, and charger

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,529 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
